alert.note: Alert for La Porte (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 07 at 2:46PM EDT until August 07 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM EDT/215 PM CDT/ FOR PULASKI...WESTERN FULTON...STARKE...SOUTHWESTERN MARSHALL AND SOUTHWESTERN LA PORTE COUNTIES... At 245 PM EDT/145 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Knox, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Plymouth, Knox, Winamac, North Judson, Culver, Medaryville, Oak Grove, Ripley, Kewanna, Monterey, Leiters Ford, Lomax, Beardstown, Ober, English Lake, Denham, Hibbard, Clarks, Winona and Delong. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
